Harimau Chair

Always with the protection and rejuvination of the environment at their hearts, Harimau are delighted to have teamed up with the good people at Italian furniture giants “Sieda” to bring this 100% recycled, octo-carbon piece to your eco-home. Take a load off safe in the knowledge that no planets were harmed in the making of your comfortable new chair.

Always with the protection and rejuvination of the environment at their hearts, Harimau are delighted to have teamed up with the good people at Italian furniture giants “Sieda” to bring this 100% recycled, octo-carbon piece to your eco-home. Take a load off safe in the knowledge that no planets were harmed in the making of your comfortable new chair. [#Legal]

Toujours engagée en faveur de la protection et de la restauration de l'environnement, Harimau est ravie de s'être associée avec le merveilleux personnel du géant italien du mobilier, "Sieda", pour vous proposer cette œuvre écologique, réalisée en octocarbone 100 % recyclé. Décontractez-vous en sachant qu'aucune planète n'a été maltraitée pour fabriquer votre nouveau fauteuil si confortable. [#Legal]

Umweltschutz und Aufforstung liegen Harimau am Herzen. Deshalb freuen wir uns, in Kooperation mit den netten Leuten des italienischen Möbelgiganten „Sieda“ diesen zu 100 % aus recyceltem Material bestehenden Okto-Karbon-Sessel anbieten zu können. Wir bieten Entspannung in der Gewissheit, dass keinem Planeten bei der Produktion dieses neuen, bequemen Stuhles geschadet wurde. [#Legal]

Tenendo sempre conto della protezione e del rinnovamento ambientale, la Harimau è lieta di presentare, con la collaborazione dei giganti italiani dell'arredamento “Sieda”, questa sedia in materiale riciclato al 100% in fibra di carbonio per la vostra casa ecologica. Rilassatevi nella consapevolezza che nessun pianeta ha sofferto per la produzione della vostra nuova sedia. [#Legal]

Sin renunciar a la protección y al rejuvenecimiento del medio ambiente, Harimau se complace en ofrecerte, de la mano del gigante italiano Sieda, líder del sector mobiliario, esta silla de octocarbono, 100% reciclada, para tu hogar ecológico. Descansa con la seguridad de que no has contribuido al deterioro planetario con la adquisición de este nuevo y cómodo modelo. [#Legal]

Take a load off safe in the knowledge that no planets were harmed in the making of your comfortable new chair. [#Legal]
